xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: confluence.migrator.application=Confluence Migrator ### Wizzard steps confluence.migrator.step.profiles.label=Step 1 confluence.migrator.step.profiles.description=Profile confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.label=Step 2 confluence.migrator.step.prerequisites.description=Prerequisites ### Profile confluence.migrator.profile.title=Migration Profile confluence.migrator.profile.titlehint=The title of the new profile Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_username=Username Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_usernamehint=Your Atlassian account username. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_token=Token Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_tokenhint=The API token for your Atlassian account that will be used to enable the analysis of your Confluence data. Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_url=URL Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_urlhint=The URL of the Confluence instance (ex: https://my.atlassian.net/). Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_space=Space Confluence.Tools.MigrationProfileClass_0_spacehint=The space that will be imported in XWiki. confluence.migrator.start=Start migration confluence.migrator.resume.current=The current profile is active. Please [[resume the current migration>>Confluence.Migrator]]. confluence.migrator.resume.other=The current active profile is has not finished running. Please resume [[{0}>>{1}]] before starting the current profile. confluence.migrator.profile.description=A migration profile is defined by the data about authentication, the Confluence instance URL and the space to be migrated. The status of the migration is stored into the profile so that the migration can resumed at any step. confluence.migrator.profile.active=The profile [[{0}>>{1}]] has been actived for the current migration with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activenext=To start the migration with the current profile, click on the **Next** button. confluence.migrator.profile.create=Click on the following link to [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]]. confluence.migrator.profile.orcreate=If the existing profiles do not match your needs, you can [[create a new profile>>path:{0}]] to start a new migration. confluence.migrator.profile.activecurrent=The current migration runs with the following parameters : confluence.migrator.profile.activemissing=There is no active migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.list=You can start the migration from one of the existing profiles : confluence.migrator.start.migration=Start this migration confluence.migrator.reset.migration=Reset migration confluence.migrator.profile.update=Updating migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.updatesuccess=The migration profile has been updated. confluence.migrator.profile.reset=Resetting migration profile. confluence.migrator.profile.resetsuccess=The migration has been reset successfully. ### Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.title=Prerequisites confluence.migrator.prerequisites.description=At this step the minimal requirements for the migration are being listed.
